string-array.name: practical_aims
string-array.item:
Develop and Mobile Application for following topic
 	1. Design Login activity and implement control events : Use EditText, Checkbox and Buttons
 	2. Create Activities and implement following
 		i. Implicit intent
 		ii. Explicit Intent
 		iii. StartActivityForResult
 	3. Implement activity Lifecycle and State Callbacks

Develop and Mobile Application for following topic
 	1. Implement Practical 1.1 using following layouts:
 		1. Linear Layout
 		2. Relative Layout
 		3. Table Layout
 	2. Use an Options Menu
 	3. Create a Recycler View and list the details of student using following fields:
 		1. Name
 		2. Address
 		3. Photo (Image)
 		4. Delete ( Button Operation)

Develop and Mobile Application for following topic
 		1. Theme,
 		2. Custom Styles
Develop and Mobile Application for storing Data and Retrieve and Manipulate data Using SQLite database\n

Develop and Mobile Application for following topic
 	1. Use an AsyncTask to access remote database (make a use of simple PhP Web service)
 	2. Use Retrofit to access remote database (make a use of simple PhP Web service)

Develop and Mobile Application for following topic
 	1. Get and Save User Preferences
 	2. Use Firebase to perform CRUD operation

Develop and Mobile Application for following topic
 	1. BroadcastReceiver
 	2. Notifications

Develop and Mobile Application for following topic
 	1. Make a use of android system like play audio,Video,Send SMS,Email,
 	2. Using location service get the current location
 	3. Display the use of animations
Develop a Mobile application for any topic (Mini Project)\n
Write Steps to generate a APK File of Mini Project and publish the Application\n
